org.jsoup.select

类 Evaluator.Matches

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsoup.select.Evaluator
      • org.jsoup.select.Evaluator.Matches
  • 封闭类:
    Evaluator

    public static final class Evaluator.Matches
extends Evaluator
    Evaluator for matching Element (and its descendants) text with regex

    • 方法详细资料

      • matches

        public boolean matches(Element root,
              Element element)
        从类复制的说明: Evaluator
        Test if the element meets the evaluator's requirements.
        指定者:
        matches 在类中 Evaluator
        参数:
        root - Root of the matching subtree
        element - tested element
        返回:
        Returns true if the requirements are met or false otherwise
